title: What is the future of web technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Future of Web Technology might have been asked in different context as Advancement of Web Technology in future, as the earlier gives a negative meaning to Web Technology as will the Web Technology survive in future. To be clear, there is no ending for the Web Technology and it will keep growing as now. Earlier it was HTML and now it is HTML5 which is also used for Mobile Apps Development. We have a bunch of new languages coming in like Node.js, Angular.js which are even used to build enterprise level applications. You can even visually see how the facebook of 2007 and current looks like. That is the power of Web. Being a web developer will always keep you committed for sure now and even in future. :) Proud being a Web Developer !

Web will expand. It'll not just be your browser and the server but it'll be more and more about devices. All kinds of devices will have a small operating system and connectivity capable of providing APIs for common people who know JavaScript to extend their functionality. You'll be able to hook your phone with just about anything you own that has power in it and access them anywhere. Just like today one can install a server on their computer and hook it up with their phone but it'll be much more accessible and it'll just not be only computers but all sorts of devices. Because of this, new frameworks will be published where you can connect your stuff securely into social media and other resources. Your presence will not just be you behind the keyboard but it'll be also your stuff available online.

In recent years web has become part and parcel of everyday activities we tend to do every transaction online like shopping , online banking , online purchase , reading daily news , social media activities etc., Day by day website usage is increasing abundantly due to this high usage of websites , the demand for web development is at highest.

No doubt, EcmaScript6 : The Future of JavaScript (http://www.pixelcrayons.com/blog/web-technologies/ecmascript6-the-future-of-javascript/) Now a new aspect; a new code has been added to the language to make it more versatile. This is the ECMAScript6 of Java. This script introduces many new highlights into the already well developed language.    Senior developers at most celebrated software firms believe that JavaScript is the future of Internet and ES6 the future of JavaScript. ES6 version of JavaScript has multiple features that will lead to its long survival and also contributes to the same today.  To read more : EcmaScript6 : The Future of JavaScript (http://www.pixelcrayons.com/blog/web-technologies/ecmascript6-the-future-of-javascript/)
JavaScript I think. Node and frameworks like meteor express and angular
